name: Dillinger
description: Dillinger, the last Markdown editor you'll ever need, by your's truly, Joe McCann.

dropbox_callback_url.description: the callback url that dropbox should redirect you after youve logged in. (hint: this should point back to your heroku app)

github_callback_url.description: the callback url that github should redirect you after youve logged in. (hint: this should point back to your heroku app)

github_redirect_uri.description: the callback url that github should redirect you after youve logged in. (hint: this should point back to your heroku app)

googledrive_redirect_uri.description: the callback url that google should redirect you after youve logged in. (hint: this should point back to your heroku app)

onedrive_redirect_uri.description: the callback url that onedrive should redirect you after youve logged in. (hint: this should point back to your heroku app)
